title: SOLD: 1889 Spalding Baseball Guide w/William Hulbert & Henry Chadwick Photos
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1889 Spalding Baseball Guide w/William Hulbert & Henry Chadwick Photos
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very rare 1889 Spalding Baseball Guide in pretty nice condition with front cover intact, missing back cover. All pages are in good shape, the highlights of the guide are rare 19th Century images of HOF Pioneers, William Hulbert & Henry Chadwick. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
